data.label: brltty
data.description: brltty是一个后台进程（守护进程），为使用可刷新盲文显示器的盲人提供对控制台屏幕（文本模式下）的访问。它驱动盲文显示器，并提供完整的屏幕审阅功能。还集成了一些语音功能。

data.label: brltty
data.description: brltty is a background process (daemon) which provides access to the console screen (when in text mode) for a blind person using a refreshable braille display. It drives the braille display, and provides complete screen review functionality. Some speech capability has also been incorporated.
